text: @realDonaldTrump Hurry up Joe Biden! We need a real president to lead us not a lying, selfish, evil moron! He is a murderer, killing thousands of people because he ignores the coronavirus pandemic. He's a white supremacist that won't acknowledge and support black lives matter! We deserve better!!
